resources.string: How are you doing ? You have landed on one of my android applications. Well everything starts small but some things grow up to become as large as elephants while some might always stay small like the little ant who grow as much as only a few centimeters in their whole life. But the question is how they feel about their growth. No matter how big or small your efforts and growth might be for the outsiders if you think you have grown then you have. If you think you have not then you have not.
